mapper.select: select count(*) from sale_act_price a left join sale_act p on a.act_id=p.id

select a.id,a.price,a.act_id,a.point_rate,a.start_time,a.end_time,a.forbid_flag,a.review_status,a.review_info,a.buy_type,p.name actName,p.base_price from sale_act_price a left join sale_act p on a.act_id=p.id

select count(*) from sale_act_price a left join sale_act p on a.act_id=p.id left join sys_store s on p.store_id = s.id
